info.store_title_share: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).
info.custom_liquid: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.
info.faceted_filters: Allow customers to filter by product options, product type, price, availability, and more. [Customize filters](/admin/menus).
info.text_position_block_settings: Text position settings relate to the number and order of blocks included in the section. Revisit these settings when adjusting blocks or block settings.
info.section_height_depends_on_content: Actual section height may be larger depending on the content.
info.no_effect_with_gradient_overlay: Has no effect when using a gradient overlay.
info.preview_image_share: If you share a page on social media, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).
info.height_adapts_to_first_row: The row height adapts to the height of the first block in the row. This only applies to large displays.
info.no_effect_natural_aspect_ratio: This will have no effect when media aspect ratio is set to "Natural".
info.desktop_only_thumbnails: Thumbnails are limited to desktop devices.
info.product_reviews: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews).
info.used_when_no_image: Used when no image is selected.

component.show_tab_opened_default: Show tab as opened by default

search.show_posts_and_pages: Show blog posts and pages in results

color_site_background_secondary.label: Secondary background
color_site_background_secondary.info: Use a color that is close to the site background.

cc_header_4.info: Applies to features with text over top of an image. Adjust these properties to protect the legibility of text.

cc_header_1.info: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

enable_checkout_lock_icon.label: Show lock icon on checkout buttons

product_card_crop_mode.label: Image crop mode
product_card_crop_mode.info: This will have no effect when media aspect ratio is set to "Natural".

paragraph_1.content: Use a dynamic source to highlight a unique attribute by creating product label and product label icon metafields.

Add swatch image files to your store's [files area](/admin/settings/files). Make sure the file names match the names of your color variants, replacing spaces and special characters with hyphens. For example, a variant called Pacific Blue would need a file named 'pacific-blue.png'.

swatches_custom_colors.label: Custom colors
swatches_custom_colors.info: Follow the format: <Color>: <HEX Color>. Example: Deep Purple: #7000AA. Each custom color must be on a new line.

header_2.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

alternate_image.label: Featured image
alternate_image.info: Replaces the featured article's default image. 1280 x 550px recommended.

show_image.label: Show image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more about aspect ratios](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio).

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Assign the menu to use as a reference for your subcollection. [Learn more about subcollections](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/4461865367571).

collection_card_crop_mode.label: Image crop mode
collection_card_crop_mode.info: This will have no effect when media aspect ratio is set to "Natural".

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout).
